basics.name: Mehran Hatami
basics.label: Javascript Developer and Front End Engineer
basics.summary: A JavaScript enthusiast and senior front end developer with 9 years of experience, specialized in Core JavaScript development, latest HTML5 APIs and advanced JavaScript libraries, frameworks and platforms such as AngularJS, BackboneJS, jQuery, Extjs,EmberJS and also NodeJS. He started programming when he was just 13 years old, with a C++ background, passionate about dealing with mathematics algorithms.

Created the iOS app of the "Cloud Desktop"
Working on his first official ROR app.

Using NodeJS, Express and MangoDB on the first backend layer to expose the whole application.
